articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: These 60,000-year-old poison arrows are oldest yet found - Ars Technica
articles.description: Hunter-gatherers probably derived the poison from the milky bulb extract of a Boophone disticha plant.

articles.title: Why Tech Launches Stopped Feeling Magical - Lifehacker
articles.description: People used to camp out to buy new phones. Wild!

articles.author: Yue Stella Yu
articles.title: Gov. Newsom’s last state budget: Here’s what we know - CalMatters
articles.description: Newsom's administration forecast a "modest" $2.9 billion shortfall in the coming year, down sharply thanks to continuing windfalls from tech and AI stocks.
articles.content: Keeping up with your California representatives felt impossible before. Now you can watch them like a hawk: Sign up for My Legislator, your weekly, personalized report that tracks what your state rep… [+11751 chars]
